Title: Sensex recovers 118 points as US rate hike prospects ebb
Content: Stocks rose for the first time in three days with the market benchmark Sensex rebounding 118 points to 28,123.44 on fresh buying after minutes of the U.S. Fed July meeting cooled rate hike expectatio
Author: PTI
